name: CLM_3PP_PRICING_HX
description: This table stores the third-party pricing activities for the claim.

columns.name: CLAIM_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the claim info record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: PRICING_ENTITY_ID
columns.description: This item stores third-party pricing entity.

columns.name: PRICING_ENTITY_ID_RUL_NAME
columns.description: The name of the third-party pricing entity, grouper, or rule.

columns.name: ENTITY_GROUPER_ID
columns.description: This item stores the third-party pricing entity grouper.

columns.name: ENTITY_GROUPER_ID_RUL_NAME
columns.description: The name of the third-party pricing entity, grouper, or rule.

columns.name: SEND_DT
columns.description: This item stores the date the claim was sent for third-party pricing.

columns.name: DUE_DT
columns.description: This item stores the due date for the third-party pricing.

columns.name: COMPLETE_DT
columns.description: This item stores the third-party pricing complete date.

columns.name: CANCEL_DT
columns.description: This item stores the date the claim batch for third-party pricing was cancelled.

columns.name: REJECTED_YN
columns.description: This item stores whether the third-party pricer rejected the claim.

columns.name: ACTION_C_NAME
columns.description: This item stores the action that should be taken for a claim that has been rejected by the third party pricer.
